channel.title: How do I make drops out of 1000 and not out of 100
channel.description:
How would i make it so the drops are out of 1000 and not 100...Im trying to make My GWD drops more rare
Any ideas would help.. Thanks

item.title: How do I make drops out of 1000 and not out of 100
item.dc:creator: @TimeWarp TimeWarp
item.description:
@TimeWarp wrote:

1:i never called you dumb i said i dont want dumb COMMENTS
2:I do pay attention
3:Does it look like im crying? i just want some help

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make drops out of 1000 and not out of 100
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“TimeWarp, post:15, topic:241385”][quote author=Full Metalst link=topic=317721.msg2520494#msg2520494 date=1225846938]
I dunno how to do that I’m sorry :(.
[/quote]
Its fine… it looks like no1 really knows… only person i know thats done it is Rog3r

Thats not what i mean…I meant like in NPCDROPS.Cfg when you add the chance for a item to drop off a NPC its out of 1000 not 100…

… if u dont know wat to add then just make the % 1… and or just dont make the npc’s drop them…

Are you totally missing the point? I asked for HELP not dumb comments like that[/quote]

your the dumb one… if u would pay attention and stop crying over the stupid shit.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make drops out of 1000 and not out of 100
item.dc:creator: @dontreadthis dontreadthis
item.description:
@dontreadthis wrote:

well the way they do it is in the smaller bases like prioject c zar, they have brackets adn you can obtain a nradom item like this [4151, 536, 536, 536, 536]…this means that u can get whip 1 in 5 times and bones 4 in 5 times.idk though.thats alot if ur using deltascape.

item.title: How do I make drops out of 1000 and not out of 100
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“TimeWarp, post:5, topic:241385”][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=317721.msg2520418#msg2520418 date=1225845617]
you need to fix the integer’s… so go in ur handler for the drops and fix them so u can use the .01 or .04 etc…
[/quote]
I dont have a drophandler AND id rather it just be out of 1000 like rog3r did… its much easier that way…i tryed searching his source that has it Thru like everyfile to look for something that might be it… but no luck[/quote]
then do it in client.java or npc.java… just add a new void.
